entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • support kernel TLS and offload on Linux #66224
  • expose HttpConnection #66223
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MetadataUpdatePreviousTypeAttribute #66222
  • [iOS] [System.Text.Json] Number_AsCollectionElement_RoundTrip test failure on device #66220
  • AddUserSecrets fails in environment for "DOTNET_USER_SECRETS_FALLBACK_DIR" #66219
  • Regex Matches Count gives ArgumentOutOfRangeException (regression) #66212
    7.0.0
  • [Crossgen2 / windows / arm64] JIT\Performance\CodeQuality\BenchmarksGame\regex-redux\regex-redux-5 AV's in the CoreCLR runtime #66210
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'comp->supportSIMDTypes()' #66206
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'IsBaselineSimdIsaSupportedDebugOnly()' #66205
    7.0.0
  • JSONSourceGenerator: JsonSerializerContext requiring implementing all functions in partial class #66203
  • No package validation coverage for runtime.native.System.IO.Ports #66201
  • Suboptimal code generated for ValueTuple.GetHashCode() #66197
  • Port Unity's Mono embedding API tests to src/tests/Interop/MonoAPI #66194
    Future
  • Debugging information corrupt #66191
  • InternalException at SslStream at DuplexPipeStreamAdapter DisposeAsync #66188
  • An exception is thrown when getting PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters #66186
  • Storing objects from another `AssemblyLoadContext` inside its own instance inhibits unloadability. #66184
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Invoke\\fptr\\ftn_t_il_r\\ftn_t_il_r.cmd #66183
  • Test failure profiler/eventpipe/eventpipe/eventpipe.sh #66174

Closed

  • System.IO Symbolic Link work planned for .NET 7 #57205
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.ContainsTrue<String> #65852
    7.0.0
  • It #66214
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.ZLibStreamUnitTests.Dispose_ClosesStream(disposeMode: 1) #65650
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Bytemark\\Bytemark\\Bytemark.cmd #65940
    7.0.0
  • R2R Crossgen2 breaks simple try catch statement with generic type #66005
  • [mono] Portable threadpool does not support async IO eg ThreadPoolBoundHandle on Windows #34582
    7.0.0
  • FileSystemWatch EnableRaisingEvents not supported on MonoVM #63185
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse2\\StoreAligned_r\\StoreAligned_r.cmd #65982
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse1\\ConvertToInt32_ro\\ConvertToInt32_ro.cmd #66052
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Bmi2.X64\\Bmi2.X64_ro\\Bmi2.X64_ro.cmd #66048
  • JsonSerializer should support named member tuples #66199
  • Repeatedly initialize the static variables s_defaultSimpleConverters and s_defaultFactoryConverters when calling the method GetConverter of JsonSerializerOptions #65770
    7.0.0
  • [DebuggerDisplay] for JsonTypeInfo does not render #65960
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl.Tests creates files not easily removed #66108
    7.0.0
  • Consider renaming unixinterface.cpp #61818
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById() returns Process objects for non-running processes #66096
  • [net7 Preview1][hot reload] Adding new methods in blazor wasm asserts at debug-mono-ppdb.c:499 #65808
    7.0.0
  • [test][mono][linux][x64] System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DisposeAsync.DisposeAsyncFlushes library test failed #65835
  • [MonoAPI] embedding API testing and API headers quality of life improvements #64456
    7.0.0
  • UseWindowsService then run in windows service will crash. #65696
  • What method can be used to automatically know whether this package supports the actual installed platform? #66181
  • ExecutionEngineException when using step-by-step #63199
    7.0.0
  • Start using the Regex source generator in this repo #62105
  • Composite images add their code ranges to the code manager too often #65481
  • System.Text.Json ReferenceHandler.IgnoreCycles #66187
  • All test inputs are not being executed when using DataRow #66182
  • Assertion failed 'block->KindIs(BBJ_NONE, BBJ_ALWAYS)' #65332
    7.0.0
  • Generic attributes: Attribute.GetCustomAttributes returns null when passed an unbound generic type #64335
    7.0.0
  • Potential for optimizing the ValueTask.Preserve method #66172
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeEndEntity_IssuerUnrelatedOcsp(pkiOptions: IssuerRevocationViaCrl | OcspEverywhere) #66177
  • Stepping into multidimensional array of tuples in debug causes internal CLR error #38777
    Future
  • Add rid for Asianux Server 8 #2129
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] add RID for Ubuntu 22.04 #66225
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Partial revert of Maui Install Fix #65904 #66221
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Rename classes in p/invoke generator to be `LibraryImport` #66217
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add missing regex position check after BOL optimization #66216
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Revisiting nullable annotations on caching #66215
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [mono] Put WeakAttribute support under an ifdef #66213
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Remove SkipVerification support from the runtime #66211
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: add OSR patchpoint strategy, inhibit tail duplication #66208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix catching of generic exception in crossgened shared generic code #66207
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use CMakeProjectReference instead of ProjectReference #66202
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Try to remove "-" and "'" from HighCharTable #66200
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Replace TargetFrameworks with TargetFramework where possible #66198
  • skip the test when dotnet.exe is locked #66196
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Add xarch `blsi` #66193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport docs fixes for Cbor #66180
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Use RegexGenerator in applicable tests #66179
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Merged

  • Delete `compUnsafeCastUsed` #66204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix DebuggerDisplay for serializer types #65971
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Slightly more aggressive ASG reversal #65920
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Keep the volatility of `CLS_VAR`s in rationalization #65919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix source generated regex compilation failure due to mismatched notion of atomic #66195
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Clean up stale use of runtextbeg/end in RegexInterpreter #66178
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Use INITIAL_MEMORY instead of TOTAL_MEMORY #65790
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix catching of generic exception in crossgened shared generic code #66162
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove the multitarget from ILCompiler.Reflection.R2R #66175
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Make sure that StressLogAnalyzer works with filtering 64 bit addresses #64594
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update files to remove imhameed #66160
    area-Meta
  • Make ReadStack.JsonTypeInfo derivation logic consistent with WriteStack's #66169
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix issues related to JsonSerializerOptions mutation and caching. #65863
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Some more clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #66018
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix System.IO.Ports native package not getting published any longer after the oob + sfx split #66176
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Remove support for nint/nuint/nfloat from mini-native-types.c #65967
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • delete the test file with custom security settings when it's being closed #66192
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Rename unixinterface.cpp -> exports.cpp #66190
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [tests] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    area-Interop-mono
  • Use RegexGenerator in System.Private.Xml #66142
    area-System.Xml
  • Update Traversal msbuild SDK #66165
  • Only register composite R2R native image code range once #65623
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't add TestLibrary as a reference to all runtime tests #66157
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve ICU missing msg for Alpine #66150
    area-System.Globalization
  • Correct JsonPropertyOrderAttribute's ctor XMLDoc #66173
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Skip Upper vector save/restore for blocks that THROW #66109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename `DllImportGenerator` project to `LibraryImportGenerator` #66029
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • retire DummyTcpServer from SslStream tests #65876
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • [Release/6.0] Backport of Mariner 2.0 and Linux Arm64 packaging work #65979
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.4
  • Update the StubManager for better debugger stepping. #65947
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 and 9 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

Updated

  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tracing to the Linux X509Chain implementation #65860
    area-System.Security
  • Add partial to the enclosing types when running the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport fixer #65452
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1646089 #66130
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Initial lookbehind support for RegexCompiler / source generator #66127
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. #65682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Count `OBJ/BLK` as memory uses #66135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating native traces from JS, using a symbols file #66042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Revert "[Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons (#65128)" #66088
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Decommit region tails #66008
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Draft] Remove reference projects from nearly all out-of-band projects #65775
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use ApiCompatTask in ApiCompat.proj #66073
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • Fix NonBacktracking quadratic behavior with deep loops #66038
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Abstractions` #65403
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Adding Count(ReadOnlySpan<char>) Overloads #66026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector64/128 "All" and "Any" variants of GT/GE/LT/LE #65889
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Merikhamoyan vector intrinsics operators #66002
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add ios-arm64 logic to create .ipa for perf runs #66159
  • Add Android 32 to RID graph #66022
    area-Meta
  • Fix clash between tentative method optimizations #66145
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Get rid of fallback to process ids enumeration in ProcessManager.IsProcessRunning (Windows) #65041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Address feedback on fabricbot config for area pods #66137
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Fixes #66141: ConfigurationBinder and ISet #66151
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Just a test for CI ignore #66053
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Remove WebRequest from SoundPlayer #65854
    area-System.Net, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Accessing an array of ValueTuple<int[], int, ...> throws exception if code is optimized #24234
  • The name of /p:ContinuousIntegrationBuild is too generic #24232
  • Top-level reference to type Program sometimes fails with The type or namespace name 'Program' could not be found #24223
  • B #24221

PullRequests

Created

  • Hostfxr changes #24235
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update 6.0.3xx with the 6.0.200 version of files #23977
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools #24168
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Detect if a particular execution of the SDK is on a CI system or not #24166
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1644782 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24214
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Workload update timer #24104
    Area-Workloads

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `async foreach` binds to `IAsyncDisposable.DisposeAsync()` rather than pattern based `DisposeAsync()` #59955
    Compiler.Next
  • Add an attribute specifying the original type, when we create a diff of a ReloadableType #59954
  • Foreach interator variable wrongly captured/wrong context for async methods #59953
  • Problem with {} brackets not linking up properly. #59951
  • CSharpGoToImplementation.SimpleGoToImplementation test is not deterministic #59950
    17.2
  • Unexpected Debug.Assert is fired for erroneous scenario. #59946
    Backlog
  • Source Generator - Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.CodeAnalysis on Azure Devops build agent #59945
  • "Implement interface" action can implement the wrong interface #59942

Closed

  • Test plan for pattern matching on `ReadOnlySpan<char>` #59191
    17.2
  • Slice pattern: cannot modify slice #59943
  • Nullability flow analysis does not work with logical OR/AND boolean operators. #59812
  • Escape analysis inconsistency (CS8353) #59908

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose ForceExpandedCompletionIndexCreation option to O# #59958
    Area-IDE
  • SyntaxContext's GlobalStatementContext changes #59957
    Area-IDE
  • Update integration tests to support both possible Go To Implementation results #59956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Insert 17.2-p2 to VS rel/d17.2 #59952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • CSharpImportAdder should be able to add the intended import if the identifier is a var #59947
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid Large Object Heap allocations in GetPrioritizedPendingDocuments #59944
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59939
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Avoid deadlock while loading ExtensionManagerPackage for integration tests #59910
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Ignore documents from projects that do not support EnC when calculating active statements #59839
    Area-Interactive, Approved to merge, 17.2.P2
  • Additional tests for pattern matching on `Span<char>` #59876
    Area-Compilers
  • Add back OmniSharpInlineHints #59941
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Push the two-step navigation system further through roslyn. #59802
    Area-IDE
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Break out embedded language classification entirely from normal classification #59896
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59940
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update CodeStyle/format/SDK versions #59903
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59959
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Editor namespaces refactoring - part 1 #59907
    Area-IDE
  • Codeaction diagnostics #59787
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude object's methods from ref struct completion list #59884
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix pattern based arguments in ForEachLoopOperationInfo without binding assumptions #59887
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Require a matching regular operator for a checked operator #59937
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Port more flaky integration tests #59897
    Area-Infrastructure
  • only include entry points defined in source #59836
    Area-IDE
  • Capability tracking #59938
    Area-Interactive
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #59874
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter to exact test class names in RunTests #59752
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Break out embedded language classification (MEF side) #59905
    Area-IDE
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE, LSP

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to write Integration Tests for Blazor Webassembly (deps.json is missing) and Dependency Injection #40549
  • [blazor-wasm] Improve handling OOM error, and surface it better #40548
  • "body stream already read" error due to broken blazor wasm fallback #40547
  • Visual Studio 2022 v 17.1 corrupting serviceworker.js when publishing to Windows app service not Linux app service #40544
  • Add `AuthorizationFilterAttribute` likes `ActionFilterAttribute` #40542
  • Rewrite React teomplate as function component with hooks #40540
    Backlog
  • JavaScript component generation for Vue #40539
  • ViewEngine can't find view in RCL without 'Views' folder in WebAPI project #40537
  • Reactive HubConnectionState #40536
  • JsonHubProtocol has isolated gson instance #40535
  • Public setter for HttpClient in Java Client #40534
  • Azure webapps rewriting backslash to slash #40532

Closed

  • Azure webapps rewriting backslash to slash #40538
  • The #40545
  • Build fails if Blazor Parameter namespace matches a nested namespace #40524
  • Idea on improving WebAssembly Performance #39277
    Discussions
  • Razor automatic encoding inside <script> tags #40423
    Discussions
  • Redis Performance Degrade after upgrade to .NET6 #39961
  • Add support for endpoint filters #37853
    7.0-preview3
  • [API Review]: Add support for endpoint filters in minimal APIs #40506
    7.0-preview3
  • .Net Core Web API shows inexplicable behavior with Swagger UI and If-None-Match header #40374
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Check jdk is correctly installed #40550
    area-infrastructure
  • Diff branches #40543
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task (#40198) #40533
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Try older installers branch #40530

Merged

  • Update vs json files to pickup correct arm64 versions #40541
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/6.0] Update Selenium versions #40509
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • feat (MVC) : Add EmptyResult property to `ControllerBase` #40515
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview3
  • Sealed DelegateRouteHandlerFilter #40531
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/5.0] Update Selenium versions #40511
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Restore use of ParameterDefaultValue in ActivatorUtilities #40529
    7.0-preview3
  • Add support for endpoint filters in minimal APIs #40491
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview3
  • Ensure error boundary service is registered as part of call to AddBlazorWebView #40508
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.4

Updated

  • Update sdk to v7.0.100-preview.3.22122.1 #40353
    area-infrastructure
  • Working ANCM arm64 installers #39523
    area-runtime
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Guidance on using PerfView/other perf visualization tools. #2911
    .NET 7.0
  • Debugging dumps with cross-platform DAC. #2910
    .NET 7.0
  • Counters "best practices" - when to use PollingCounter vs EventCounter, Incrementing vs non-Incrementing, thread safety, etc. #2909
    .NET 7.0
  • Using EventSource's Start/Stop opcodes - cover best-practices and potential caveats. #2908
    .NET 7.0
  • Diagnosing threadpool starvation #2907
    .NET 7.0
  • Diagnosing memory leaks with native leaks. #2906
    .NET 7.0
  • Diagnosing managed memory leaks with dotnet-gcdump. #2905
    .NET 7.0
  • Writing "fast" EventSource with WriteEventCore API "best practices". #2904
    .NET 7.0
  • E2E guide how to collect a dump and debug it with VS or LLDB #2903
    .NET 7.0
  • Writing a custom EventSource, capture with dotnet-trace, view with VS #2902
    .NET 7.0
  • Diagnosing CPU usage with dotnet-trace and VS #2901
    .NET 7.0
  • Diagnostic Port and Microsoft.Diagnostics.NetCore.Client #2900
    .NET 7.0
  • Symbol and Source Indexing #2899
    .NET 7.0

Closed

  • DiagnosticSource and DiagnosticListener #2898

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update SOS for when the portable thread pool is used for IO completions on Windows #2870
    .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove hard tabs from templates #5068
  • grey titlebar on windows when using the content page #5067
  • Application.UserAppTheme is no longer consulted when applying AppThemeBindings #5066
  • [Spec] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #5063
  • [Android] RTE ShellFragmentContainer #5062
  • Border doesn't render background first run #5061
  • Resolve services in ViewHandler is not working #5056

Closed

  • Provide an event on all Controls Views that will indicate when they have become attached/detached from platform window #4590
  • Shadows disappear after navigating to different page #4480
  • [Bug] [Android] Adding new Cell to existing Table Section causes Java.Lang.IllegalStateException #2123
  • [Bug] ListView crash in preview 5 on Android and Windows #1366
  • [Bug] FlyoutBehavior in WinUI shows duplicated hambruger and crash #2475
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] iOS device test visual runner CollectionView crash #3104
  • [Bug] [WinUI] RefreshView throws Null Reference Exception for Dispatcher when initialized. #2441
  • Refactor Essentials statics into interfaces/singletons #4497
  • Delete the Visual Property or Make it work #3833
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • Dependency issue when building / running the base template on MacOs ARM (ios, android and MacCatalyst workloads) #5054
  • Error compiling release version in Xamarin UWP #4417
  • [Templates] ContentPage item template uses obsolete API #4533
  • [Bug] Maui Templates doesn't automatically update with VS installer (17.1.0 Preview 1.0) #3312
  • [Bug] MAUI Essentials GetLocationAsync doesn't work - throws error #1166
  • VS 2022 Preview 17.1 on PC. Created Maui app. Ran on Android fine. Updated Nuget Pkgs to latest version. Then project wouldn't load. #3983
  • Picker on Windows Doesn't Update Display When Item is Selected #5038

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for configuring WebViewSettings via DI #5059
  • Add Resource Dictionary Template #5052
    area/templates 📄
  • Fix Path shapes rendering issues #5051
    area/drawing ✏️, high
  • DisplayActionSheet later #5047
    platform/windows 🪟

Merged

  • Switch to dispatcher so Dispose is called after DestroyView #5064
  • Loaded/Unloaded events and propagate Window #5027
  • Remove Routing with a Fully Qualified Type name #5045
  • [Android] ClipRect in MauiScrollView Draw method #5002
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Correctly render shadow navigating back #5035
    platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, high
  • Remove Controls.Picker.TextTransform binding #4967
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Remove Material Visual marker #4428
  • More backports #5060
  • Backport preview 14 #5046
  • Implement InputTransparent #4995
    area/controls 🎮
  • [ci] Remove image override #5053
  • Remove `DisableImplicitNamespaceImports` config #5009

Updated

  • CarouselView android handler #3343
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [GH-4958] Platform behavior implementation #5043
  • Make Maui.Core, Controls.Core, and Controls.Xaml Trimmable #5028
    do-not-merge, area/app-size 🤏
  • Add Shell to default template #4524
    area/templates 📄
  • Fix template build to use correct slashes on all platforms #4991
    area/templates 📄
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Allow non-dot decimal separator in BindingExpression #5005
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migration for updated seed data with enum property values converted to string does not set converted enum zero values correctly #27575
  • Add a flag to opt into SaveChanges transactions even where they're not necessary #27574
    7.0.0
  • Are delete actions ignored by the Cosmos provider? #27572
  • Disable lazy loading proxies on demand #27570
  • Can entities have a foreign key to an individual owned item of another entity (OwnsMany)? #27569
  • Applying configurations for entities in DataContext #27568
  • QueryTrackingBehavior.NoTracking has different behavior in 'Debug' and 'Release' mode #27567
  • Help in getting a custom IServiceProvider working with the NodaTime NuGet package. #27566

Closed

  • SQL Server: cannot batch-insert entities with generated values only that have a computed column #27507
    7.0.0
  • Stop wrapping single changes in transactions where possible #27439
    7.0.0
  • Throws System.InvalidOperationException where Any is used with FromSqlRaw #27546
  • ef migrations bundle error: warning MSB3026 - The process cannot access the file #27544
  • EF Core 6 , on model builder configuration doesn't have (Map) Method #27517
  • Azure DevOps build fails after updating to .NET/EF Core 6, ModelShapShot with long (64bit int) id fails #27501
  • DataAnnotation BUG #27492

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve SQL Server insertion logic and other update pipeline optimizations #27573
  • Attribute for configuring composite primary keys #27571
  • Scaffolding: Enable text templates #27565

Merged

  • Be consistent about using ConditionalFact and ConditionalTheory #27558
  • Stop wrapping single changes in transactions where possible #27500

Updated

  • feat (codespaces) - Add initial support for codespaces #27483
  • Remove DisableImplicitNamespaceImports config #27545
